long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The only fully featured HUD for PokerNow. 

Features:
- Set colors and leave notes on players
- Collect and view player statistics (VPIP, PFR, 3BET, SQZ, FCB, FvFCB, ...)
- Use the above data collected on your opponents by other users of the extension
- Pot odds/equity requirement calculator
- Preflop odds simulation (against N random hands)
- Postflop odds simulation (against N random hands)

Support & Additional Info:
https://hud.zerogon.consulting

Coming soon:
- Search and replay hands collected by extension users. Find PLO hands where Opponent1 showed down his cards, or NLH hands played between you and Opponent2.
